troubleshooting.title: The ring light casts shadows on my face

condition.title: The ring light casts strange shadows on my face.

cause.title: The light is not centered
cause.p: For the best results, the ring light should be placed at face level, in front of you. If the ring light is too high or too low, or too far to one side or the other, shadows will naturally be cast on the part of your face farthest away from the light.

step.cmd: Make sure the ring light at face level and centered.

substep.cmd: When using the desktop tripod, adjust the height of the base.
When using the floor stand try adjusting the base height or lengthening the floor stand.

cause.title: The light angled incorrectly
cause.p: When using the desktop tripod, strange shadows might also be caused by the angle, or tilt of the ring light.

remedy.title: Adjust the tilt of the ring light

step.cmd: Follow these instuctions to adjust the tilt of the ring light: Adjust the ring light using the ball head.
